channel.title: Other private server sites? (no offence, just read my problem)
channel.description:
Well because some strange bug, i can no longer post a server on the moparscape serverstat page, no offence, i loved it.
But a error ended my posting for a few months, so i decided, to post my server on other sites.
Any suggestions?
Thanks very much ;)

item.title: Other private server sites? (no offence, just read my problem)

item.description:
